request.positivePrompt: Scene: A vaulted underground chamber lit by a warm, magical glow. Characters: Adrian (golden curly hair, bright blue eyes, casual hoodie/white crewneck), Alexander (tousled brown hair, bright green eyes, layered hoodie and zip vest), Verkäufer Viktor (28yo shopkeeper in green/brown/white), Eichhörnchen Emma (red-brown with magical red aura), and the rusty gate slightly ajar behind them. Action: Verkäufer Viktor stands like a guardian, presenting a glowing pouch and a flickering basket; Adrian reaches toward the pouch while Alexander hesitates; Emma watches anxiously. Lighting: dramatic, warm central glow from the pouch and basket, cool shadows on the chamber walls. Mood: tense, moral dilemma, hopeful. Camera perspective: intimate medium-close shot to capture expressions and the weight of the choice. Environment specifics: stone floor, scattered leaves, faint sound of distant wind and scraping implied. Recurring motifs: light as a test, the melody visually represented as thin ribbons of light. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly. CHARACTERS IN THIS SCENE: Adrian: 5-7 years old, male, warm golden blond short curly voluminous tousled curls hair, bright blue eyes, pale peach skin, wearing casual hoodie over white crewneck shirt, voluminous curly golden hair, large expressive bright blue eyes, rosy round childlike cheeks, small button-shaped nose, gentle small smiling mouth, prominent rounded ears slightly visible, soft pale warm skin, innocent empathetic friendly expression Alexander: 8-10 years old, male, medium brown short straight with slight wave tousled, slightly spiky at crown hair, bright green eyes, light warm peach skin, wearing casual layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest, short tousled brown hair, large bright green eyes, round youthful face, rosy button nose, small smiling mouth, light freckles and blush, slim neck and shoulders, expressive arched eyebrows, soft natural lighting Eichhörnchen Emma: Eichhörnchen Emma • ['Eichhörnchen Emma squirrel', ' small'] Verkäufer Viktor: Verkäufer Viktor • ['Verkäufer Viktor salesperson', ' 28 years'] IMPORTANT: Characters listed from youngest to oldest. Maintain size relationships - Adrian (5-7y) must be SMALLER than any older character. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly
